summary.para: Contains classes for configuring objects used to perform logging.

member.name: P:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.Logging.LoggerOptions.LogMachineName

summary.para: Includes the host name in the log.

member.value: True to include the name of the machine on which the server-side application is run; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.Logging.LoggerOptions.LogProcessId

summary.para: Includes the PID in the log.

member.value: True to include the PID; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.Logging.LoggerOptions.LogRequestId

summary.para: Includes the RequestId in the log.

member.value: True to include the RequestId; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.Logging.LoggerOptions.LogThreadId

summary.para: Includes the ThreadId in the log.

member.value: True to include the ThreadId; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.Logging.LoggerOptions.LogTimeStamp

summary.para: Includes the time stamp in the log.

member.value: True to include the current time on the machine on which the server-side application is run; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.Logging.LoggerOptions.Prefix

summary.para: Specifies the string that starts a log record.

member.value: A string that precedes the logged information in a single record.

member.name: P:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.Logging.LoggerOptions.Suffix

summary.para: Specifies the string that finalizes a log record.

member.value: A string that follows the logged information in a single record.

member.returns: The object that can be used for method chaining.

summary.para: Specifies the JavaScript function that handles the client-side OnServerError event.

member.param: The name of a JavaScript function or entire JavaScript function code that runs when the OnServerError event occurs.
member.returns: The object that can be used for method chaining.

summary.para: Specifies the JavaScript function that handles the client-side ParametersInitialized event and allows you to get the client-side parameter values when they are initialized and modify them.

member.param: The name of a JavaScript function or entire JavaScript function code that runs when the ParametersInitialized event occurs.
member.returns: The object that can be used for method chaining.

summary.para: A base class for the controller that processes HTTP requests from a Web Document Viewer.
The URI of the built-in controller to which requests are sent from a Web Document Viewer.

member.name: M:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.WebDocumentViewer.WebDocumentViewerController.Invoke

summary.para: Processes requests from the Web Document Viewer.

member.returns: An object that is the result of an action method.

summary.para: Exposes methods for registering additional services specific for the Web Document Viewer.

summary.para: Creates the class’ instance.

member.param: The application’s service collection to be populated using the WebDocumentViewerConfigurationBuilder‘s methods.

member.name: M:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.WebDocumentViewerConfigurationBuilder.DisableCachedDocumentSource

summary.para: Disables the CachedDocumentSource component usage in the Web Document Viewer.

member.returns: A that can be used to further configure the Web Document Viewer services.

member.name: M:DevExpress.AspNetCore.Reporting.WebDocumentViewerConfigurationBuilder.EnablePassingExportOptionsPasswordsToClient

summary.para: Allows you to pass PDF/Excel passwords specified in the Report Designer to the Web Document Viewer.

Security note: For security reasons, PDF/Excel passwords specified in the Report Designer are not exposed in the Web Document Viewer. Read the following topic for details: Protect Sensitive Information.

member.returns: A that can be used to further configure the Web Document Viewer services.

member.typeparam: A custom connection provider factory that implements the IConnectionProviderFactory interface.
